```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{bash}
# Keep only the variant sites of the gVCF
docker run -d -v /Data/KidsFirst/ewing_sarcoma/gVCF:/proj -w /proj -t dmill903/ch_pipeline:V1 python3 keepVariantSites.py > keepVariantSites.out
```

```{bash}
# split, left-align, and trim variants with vt per GEMINI
docker run -d -v /Data/KidsFirst/ewing_sarcoma/gVCF:/proj -w /proj -t dmill903/ch_pipeline:V1 bash vt_proband.sh > vt_proband.out
```

```{bash}
# Use snpEff to annotate vcf file
docker run -d -v /Data/KidsFirst/ewing_sarcoma/gVCF:/proj -w /proj -t dmill903/ch_pipeline:V1 bash annotate_proband.sh > annotate_proband.out
```

```{bash}
# load in GEMINI database
docker run -d -v /Data/KidsFirst/ewing_sarcoma/gVCF:/proj -w /proj -t dmill903/ch_pipeline:V1 bash gemini_proband.sh > gemini_proband.out
```
